ussr.description.geometry
Interface GeometryDescription

All Known Implementing Classes:
AtronShape, BoxShape, ConeShape, CylinderShape, GeometryDescriptionImpl, SphereShape
public interface GeometryDescription

Common interface for geometry descriptions (that can be used for building a robot)

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI
